description: {DExposed conduits arc and crackle with unrestrained power, coursing
across the face of the wall for a length before retreating back within
the western wall.  A sludge of greenish glowing material drips from
cracks in the ceiling, sloughing in piles along the ground.  Broken,
unsorted masses litter the way, awaiting the carts to take them away.
90843.name: {DA Rubble Strewn Hall{x

the ruins.  Cart tracks mar the mud sodden floor as the heavily laden
machines take away the detritus to reveal yet more mysteries.  Cracks
rupture the ceiling, allowing a greenish liquid to drip incessantly to
pool upon the floor.  {x {DA string of {Yrunes{D are splayed across the wall,

description: {DThe CRACK and BOOM of exploding devices resonates across the hall,
the origin of them is completely obscured however.  Slicks muss the
floor, mingling with piles of detritus that has yet to be removed.
Runes of unknown meaning streak across the walls.  {x
90847.name: {DA Rubble Strewn Hall{x

description: {DAn arch has been cleared to the east, where the *WHIRS* and
*CLANKS* of machinery can just be heard.  A flood of light and heat
radiates from within the room, causing a shower of water vapor to rain
down from the melting ice overhead.  Water collects at the base of the
cracked walls to pool amidst the rubble and mud along the passage.  {x
90817.name: {DA Rubble Strewn Hall{x

description: {DThe southern and northern labs appear to be in a complete state of
ruination.  From what little can be viewed from each archway, massive
bolders, glowing with radiant green energy have collapsed through the
ceiling, crushing all devices and data held within.  An acrid acidic
scent permeates the air drawing coughing fits, lending credence to the
warnings which proclaim this section to be highly dubious.  {x
90840.name: {DA Rubble Strewn Hall{x

which could certainly have led off to interesting places.  A battered
{Ysign {Ddangles above a crumbling archway, many of its letters long since
broken off by the calamity that destroyed this mysterious place.  {x {DThe
dancing lights grow in intensity, though the source remains
90802.name: {DA Rubble Strewn Hall{x

description: {DSymbols and runes decorate the broken expanse of the walls.  A
cave-in has blocked off a southern portal, a mass of timbers and rock
form a pile across the middle of the hall which makes further passage
nearly impossible.  The flickering lights continue to grow and swirl,

description: {DThe piles of rubble continue to grow, the walls themselves creak
and strain laboriously against the stresses of the crater about it.
Timbers shore up the rocks as best as can be maintained by the
engineers, however it is apparant that unless more permanent measures
are taken soon, this section of the hall will fall back into disuse
90838.name: {DA Rubble Strewn Hall{x

description: {DThe beams framing this portion of the hall sag heavily under the
weight of the overlying ice and rock.  Pools of water collect
underneath a seemingly ceaseless stream of drips and drops that fall
from cracks and creases in the walls.  Broken equipment and
unidentifiable items rust in reddish gold piles amidst the rocks and
90820.name: {DA Rubble Strewn Hall{x

description: {DA massive collapse has completely obscured another hallways that
would have traversed onward down toward the west.  Flickering lights
and beams of energy CRACKLE and FIZZLE as power streaks from broken
conduits.  Several beams jut out of the walls like broken bones.  {x
90844.name: {DA Rubble Strewn Hall{x

description: {DThe eastern arch has collapsed, completely obscuring access to the
chamber on the other side.  There are visible attempts that have been
made to remove the rubble and rocks, but it seems the area is so
unstable that any further attempts would be risky.  The air bears a
hint of ozone, as if something were carrying current nearby and
arcing.  A metal ladder descends through a port in the floor to

description: {DThe sounds of workers clearing rock and rubble away echoes across
the expanse of the hall.  The air is somewhat thin and damp, bearing
an odor of metal on metal.  Rumbles within the earth throw cascading
amounts of dust into the air which sparkle against the ever present
light glimmering across the walls.  {x {DA ladder rises to a port in the
ceiling where an iron grate awaits.  {x

description: {D The tremendous strain of the rock and ice overhead is nearly too
much for this section of the hall to bear.  The beams CREAK and GROAN
continuously, threatening to burst at any time.  The BANGS and WHIRS
of machinery echo across the passage, their origin unknown.  Runes
streak across the face of the walls.  {x
90845.name: {DA Rubble Strewn Hall{x

description: {DExcavation has progressed little in this portion of the ruin, as
only one direction seems to be roughly cleared of the obstacles
blocking the way into the interior.  Large boulders and sheens of
unmeltable ice make the northern and southern passages impassable.
Radiating light, from an unseen source shimmers and splays across the
rocks, walls and ceiling, cavorting against the shadows.  {x {DA metallic
ladder rises up to a port in the ceiling, ascending to another level.

the structure to the sparse golden hued stones that yet stand.

have played across its features is now illegible. An iron
port seals an access which leads into the depths of the

description: {DThe archways to the west and south are blocked and clogged by
broken beams, fallen rocks and masses of unmelting ice.  Sparks and
bangs erupt form the nearest chamber, presumably the misfiring of some
unseen device.  Dust falls heavily through the air, throwing sparkling
motes of light throughout the walls.  {x
90819.name: {DA Rubble Strewn Hall{x

description: {DTimbers frame the hallway at intervals traversing farther down the
passage, the weight of the rock and ice overhead making each bow
noticeably and *CREAK* alarmingly.  Rubbles lies in uncollected piles
along the way, making passage somewhat difficult.  {x
90816.name: {DA Rubble Strewn Hall{x

description:
{DThis mechanation is specifically designed for retrieval and removal
of large debris, rubble and other heavy materials.  A massive barrow
with wheels is affixed to its torso, pulled along the tracks by four
spiderlike arms whilst a massive single eye sweeps the area for
manageable material to remove.  {x
90817.room_name: {DA small golem wheels an attached barrow about, collecting rubble.{x
90817.name: {Da b{yar{Drow{xwhe{De{yle{xr{x~
subroutines:
F aff T
F vul R

description:
This device is archaic in design, bearing large wheels and massive
antennae.  The lettering on its fluidic skin is faded and nearly
indecipherable save for two letters, "H" and "R".  It appears to
ignore everything about it, until a glitch in its exposed wiring
forces it to lock onto the nearest thing around it and transmit
control orders!
90818.room_name: {DA {yr{Dov{yer{D with massive antennae traverses the rubble.{x
90818.name: {Da r{yem{Dot{ye co{Dntr{yol r{Dov{yer{x~

description:
A thin avian roughly ten feet in height stands here hunched over a
human sized desk.  The feathers on his head have been slicked back
except for one that sticks up high.  His immaculate blue button down
shirt is tucked into his black slacks and sports a red Tripower crest
on the breast.  His white lab coat has been discarded on the back of
the lab chair, completely covering it.  Despite being left alone in a
strange lab, this man has no weapon to speak of, besides running away.
90800.name: {RG{ra{Bs{bt{x~
subroutines:
M grall 90803 100~
M delay 90801 100~
M speech 90800 proceed~

description:
A man with attentive brown eyes and a buzz cut stands here guarding
the newly discovered Ruins of SIN. His TriPower armor is polished to a
shine and his hand remains on the hilt of his sword strapped to his
side.
90801.name: {RG{ror{Bd{bino{x~
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
M bribe 90839 50000000~
M grall 90806 100~

description:
An older dwarf, of unknown years, judging from his lack of hair and
abundance of snow white beard.  The wrinkles on his face are so
prolific that it would prove difficult to see his rheumy eyes were it
not for the gold wire-rimmed spectacles that he continously pushes
back up his bulbous nose in front of them.  He bends studiously over a
ragged journal, its pages yellowed and worn.  His hands, labcoat and
trousers are covered in dirt and dust, presumably from where he has
been rummaging through the ruins.  
{x
90802.room_name: {DA {ws{Wci{wen{Wtis{wt{D rummages through the dirt and rubble seeking artifacts.{x
90802.name: {WDr. {wZi{Wmba{wlist{x~
subroutines:
F res FLQ
F vul R
M grall 90804 100~
M speech 90805 quest~

description:
{DEquipped with an array of excavating materials, this researcher is
attempting to diving the secrets of the Ruins of SIN.  Mud spatters
once pristine white lab coats across the arms, down the front of the
chest and across the legs, from lifting and carrying muddy rubble and
stones.  An intensity surrounds the researcher...  Almost as if being
possessed by a hunger for discovering some long lost secret.  {x
90803.room_name: {DAn {Re{rxca{Bv{bator {Dsearches through the rubble, seeking hidden secrets.{x
90803.name: {wa {Rr{rese{Ba{brcher{x~
subroutines:
F aff T
F vul R

description:
A young dwarf, but quite clearly very bright, studies a set of
runes emblazoned upon a nearby wall.  Her beard is braided up and over
her shouders where it joins the golden hair braides that cascade down
her back.  A set of gold rimmed wire-spectacles rest squarely before a
pair of crystal blue eyes.  Her white lab coat is form fitting and
immaculate.  {x
90804.room_name: {DA {ws{Wci{wen{Wtis{wt{D closely inspects a number of odd runes.{x
90804.name: {WDr. {wTr{Wei{wnha{Wldt{x~
subroutines:
F res FLQ
F vul R
M grall 90840 100~

description:
He has moved from Mahn-Tor, and seems to like his new job as the
sewer-guy.
90805.room_name: The SpecTre of Belrak, the Minotaur Ranger is enjoying his new job.
90805.name: the SpecTre of Belrak the Ranger~

description:
{xA huge warrior stands here, fully encased in a suit of midnight
{8black{x plate mail.  The armor sport dozens of sharp ridges and spikes,
and looking closer u c hundreds of tiny {!  Skull{x in {#sunburst{x symbols
have been etched into the metal.  Its eyes glow, like hot coals, from
within its helm as the Inquisitor moves to attack.
90806.room_name: {DThe {MS{mp{DecT{mr{Me {Dof the {MU{mn{DHo{ml{My In{mqu{Disi{mto{Mr {Dstands ready to punish heretics.{x

description:
{DLeviathan in size, the wumpus is an oddity that is rarely seen out
of its cave unless highly disturbed.  Its beady eyes glimmer darkly
behind a massive snout with row upon row of daggerlike fangs.  Its
body is hyenalike in structure, in that its hindquarters are lower
than its broad forequarters.  Sharp claws, capable of rending stone
and metal ore, cap the massive feet of the beast.  Its ruddy coloring
bespeaks of a lifetime dwelling in the subterra.  {x {DArrows stud its
hide, embedded deeply within its body.  {x
90811.room_name: {DAn {ya{wb{Do{wm{yi{wn{Da{yt{Di{yo{wn{D opens its massive jaws and keens wildly.{x

description:
{DAt well over 15 feet tall, Jidonbou is a massive column of black
flames.  With two giant ethereal eyes, one blue and one red, he can
see through almost any illusion.  His right arm is made of solid
steel, absorbed from the planet itself, and it holds a massive axe. 
His left arm is made of strong oak, and is slightly encased in flames.
In his left hand, he holds a violently shivering orb.  With every step
he takes, he scorches the earth, and the flames surrounding him
produce an almost unbearable heat.  {x 
 
{DFirst sighted by: Sensui{x
90813.room_name: {DA massive entity encased in black fire rages.{x
